text:
I appreciate The Body Shop's strong commitment to cruelty-free practices. Their transparency on this issue is refreshing, and it ensures their products are ethically sourced and never tested on animals.

In addition to their ethical approach, I've always had positive experiences with the staffs. There's no hard selling. They're friendly, knowledgeable about the products, and happy to answer questions about what works best for different skin types or how to use specific products.
I recommend the products 100%, but one sales rep is impolite. Sigh.
super love their drops of youth line. it really worked on my fine lines.
2 sales representative stay in the counter but not even want to serve walk in customer.
Love their christmas deals and promos
